member.name: LinearGradientMode
member.summary: The LinearGradientMode enumeration specifies the direction in which the change of color occurs for a linear gradient brush.

member.name: LinearGradientMode.LinearGradientModeHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies the color to change in a horizontal direction from the left of the display to the right of the display.

member.name: LinearGradientMode.LinearGradientModeVertical
member.summary: Specifies the color to change in a vertical direction from the top of the display to the bottom of the display.

member.name: LinearGradientMode.LinearGradientModeForwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies the color to change in a forward diagonal direction from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the display.

member.name: LinearGradientMode.LinearGradientModeBackwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies the color to change in a backward diagonal direction from the upper-right corner to the lower-left corner of the display.
